name: Slumbering Woods
storyline: Slumbering Woods is a cosy, hand-drawn exploration and crafting adventure set in a world recovering from a long-past climate catastrophe. You play as a travelling herbalist working to restore an isolated village overtaken by rising swamp waters while reconnecting its scattered community. Shape the landscape by growing floating mushroom islands, cultivate plants based on their unique environmental needs, and gather resources to craft tools and materials with the help of the village’s skilled inhabitants.
summary: Slumbering Woods is a hand-drawn adventure where you rebuild a forgotten village, grow floating mushroom islands, cultivate plants, and uncover hidden lore in a vibrant, living world.
